successes.title: gTar: The First Guitar That Anybody Can Play
successes.description: The gTar is a fully digital guitar that enables anybody to play music quickly and easily with the help of LEDs and a docked iPhone

Pledges.description: Access to exclusive backer updates and our endless gratitude.
One gTar t-shirt designed by our insanely talented designer Maly. We'll be offering two designs to choose from in the coming weeks and you can vote on the colors.
Limited Early Bird - One White gTar and the distinction of being one of the very first gTar backers which will eventually retail for over $449.

Developer Pack - One pre-production white gTar to start tinkering with plus early access to our SDK. When we start shipping final production units, you'll have the option to send your gTar back for a new replacement.
One White gTar plus a t-shirt, stickers, and one song selection for the app (see FAQ). This is an opportunity to shape the gTar experience with music you love.

Little Kids Rock Special - Two white gTars - one of which will be delivered to you, while the other will be donated to Little Kids Rock as part of an educational pilot program we're launching. See FAQ for more information!
Family Pack - Two White gTars plus two t-shirts and stickers
Custom gTar - One Custom-Painted gTar (either a solid color or a design of your choosing), plus a t-shirt, stickers, and a song selection for the app (see FAQ for details).
Distributor Pack - Ten white gTars at volume pricing.
